name: Whisper (ihavefivehat, 8ude, mostopha)
description:
Lure the black dots into your your web and keep them there for as long as possible.

Controls: Arrow keys to move, hold down space bar to generate a node. 

Use headphones for optimal experience.

WINNER: Excellence in Engagement, Gamefest 2018

---

Corey Bertelsen - Audio design & scripting, game design

Dennis Carr - Game design & programming, visual design

Mostafa Haque - Game design & programming, visual design
